DOC.brief_summary: This study determine short- long-term postoperative difference visual corneal outcome different laser refractive surgical procedure .
DOC.detailed_description: We measure postoperative difference visual acuity , contrast sensitivity , corneal light scatter , density keratocytes subbasal nerve , corneal sensitivity , corneal topography wavefront PRK perform epithelial removal laser rotary brush LASIK perform use microkeratome use femtosecond laser . Measurements make baseline interval 5 postoperative year 21 LASIK patient , 20 PRK patient , 20 unoperated control .
DOC.criteria: Myopia 110 diopter No ocular abnormality except presbyopia
